name: Children of Liberty Screensaver
description:
Created for #screensaverjam, watch Joseph, Ally, Doug, and Sarah give a Redcoat the worst night of his life.

This screensaver is based on Children of Liberty from us at Lantana Games! It is free, but if you add a $1 or greater tip, you get a collection of 3 HD desktop wallpapers and a logo-free version of the screensaver.

This page's theme is available as part of the desi.gn template collection

Credits:

Animation: Michael Winn, Ricky Bryant Jr.
Background Art: Julia Smith, Chenylle Mercado, Karen Layman
Programming: Danny Silvers
